sentences.english: Asymptotic noon, buy flowers to people more.
sentences.chinese: 渐近中午，买花的人也多了。

sentences.english: Asymptote's design features two towers with a terminal hall suspended between them.
sentences.chinese: 渐近线设计的特点是两座塔间延展的终端展堂。

sentences.english: This paper has investigated the system of congruences and given them the asymptotic formula of the number of solutions.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一类同余方程组解数的公式或渐近公式。

sentences.english: Under some additional assumptions, the whole system is semi-global asymptotically stable (Semi-GAS).
sentences.chinese: 在适当的假设下，得到了系统的半全局渐近稳定。

sentences.english: The content of the second chapter is about precise asymptotics of bootstrap means.
sentences.chinese: 第二章的内容是关于再抽样均值序列的精确渐近性质。

sentences.english: This paper deals with a kind of singular boundary value problems with asymptotically linear term.
sentences.chinese: 讨论一类具有渐近线性项的奇异边值问题。

sentences.english: The frequency in the response spectrum where the zero period acceleration asymptote begins.
sentences.chinese: 频率响应谱中的零期渐近开始加速。

sentences.english: In this paper, we study the asymptotic equipartition property ( AEP ) form order nonhomogeneous Markov information source.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究非齐次m阶马氏信源的渐近均分割性。

sentences.english: Our Mongolian adventure was drawing to a close.
sentences.chinese: 至此，我们的蒙古冒险之旅渐近尾声。

sentences.english: Under suitable conditions the asymptotic behavior of the generalized solution for the problems are studied.
sentences.chinese: 在适当的条件下，研究了问题广义解的渐近性态。

sentences.english: Using the perturbative method the asymptotic solution of the corresponding model is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 利用摄动方法求出了相应模式的渐近解。
他把这些解叫作渐近解。

sentences.english: In high energy region, the asymptotic freedom perturbation theory is used.
sentences.chinese: 在高能时，应用渐近自由的微扰论。

sentences.english: In this paper we discuss the existence of solution of an asymptotically linear wave equation.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论渐近线性强迫波方程周期解的存在性。

sentences.english: Think, continue to think, for the day is asymptotically Shu, see light.
sentences.chinese: 思索，继续不断的思索，以待天曙，渐近乃见光明。

sentences.english: One is the asymptotic nature with the solution of small fractional damping oscillator.
sentences.chinese: 一类是具有小分数阶阻尼振子解的渐近性。

definition: to thin out gradually/to become fainter and fainter
to be about to arrive/to be around the corner
to hear suddenly/to learn of sth unexpectedly
small craftsman (contemptuous)/clatter (e.g. of footsteps)/jumbled mass/press of bodies/tumult
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
first of the five night watch periods 19:00-21:00 (old)
to speed up gradually/faster and faster/(music) accelerando
